title: Calories in Nando's Chicken Breast
meta_description: Learn calories in nandos peri-peri chicken breast (1 serving), plus protein, fat, carbs, sodium, and tweaks for different preparations.
assumptions: Grilled, skinless, boneless chicken breast with medium peri-peri marinade; approx. 150 g serving size.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by spice level, portion size, cooking method, and added sides/sauces. Check Nando's menu or app for exact values.

quick_answer.text: One Nando's peri-peri chicken breast provides ~250 kcal and ~45 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Extra hot peri-peri sauce (adds spice and slight sugars)
Add 1 tbsp peri-peri sauce on side

faqs.q: How many calories in nandos chicken breast?
faqs.a: About 250 kcal for one grilled, skinless peri-peri chicken breast.

faqs.q: What is the protein in a Nando's chicken serving?
faqs.a: Approximately 45 g protein per chicken breast.

faqs.q: Does Nando's chicken have a lot of sodium?
faqs.a: Yes, around 600 mg due to the peri-peri marinade; varies by spice.
Base chicken is 250 kcal; adding chips or rice can add 200-400 kcal.

faqs.q: Are Nando's values for grilled or fried?
faqs.a: Primarily grilled; fried options like wraps add more calories from oil.
